review_details:
We had a phenomenal fishing trip with Kiriakos and his daughter Tina.
Wonderful people not only as “fishing bodies” but also a wonderful family.
We visited many beautiful places and had a great lunch . You must experience it !!!!
Greeeeaaat ️️️️️️️
️J&P

Wonderful stay in Ostria Hotel
We found this family run hotel on trip advisor .
I would like to express my thanks to the entire staff Petros , Argyro , and the young energetic new generation Nick, Christine .
All off them made us feel home and all of them were very attentive to all our requests . They recommended wonderful places, great restaurants and overall made us feel as a part of a family . BRAVO !!!!
J & P

Milos Experience
Road trip. June , 16 2019
I cAnt express my pleasure with experience we got by using Milos Experience road trip company . Owner Michalis Vamvarakis is a great , wonderful super honest person . You can trust him explicitly !
Our driver Panos was very passionate , showed us many “hidden from tourists “ places . The time passed very fast and we had a great experience.
You will be never disappointed by knowing Michalis and Panos !!!!
J &P
